task.title: Credit Card Not Present
task.shortdesc: The credit card is not physically present during the transaction.

step.cmd: You can use this option to process a credit card when the card is not physically available.
In these instances the credit card information is mailed or provided over the phone.

stepresult.p: The virtual terminal does not automatically provide acknowledgment or report information to your Blackbaud programs. You will need to export this information from the web portal.
